spec_data.Name: arduino-doc
spec_data.Description:
Arduino is an open-source electronics prototyping platform based on
flexible, easy-to-use hardware and software. It's intended for artists,
designers, hobbyists, and anyone interested in creating interactive
objects or environments.

This package contains reference documentation.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 24 Aug 2017 04:50:09 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Documentation for the Arduino micro-controller platform
